moduleDescription: This module will serve as an introduction to Vocal Pedagogy and will consist of a survey of the current literature on the subject as well as supervised teaching of a beginning level voice student. Course requirements include extensive reading, written assignments, in-class presentations, and mid-term and final examinations.
faculty: YONG SIEW TOH CONSERVATORY OF MUSIC
department: YONG SIEW TOH CONSERVATORY OF MUSIC
